name: gar
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to express anger or for emphasis: "Enough!" he cried in fury. "By gar! You will kill him!" Gar, I could weep!
More examplesFewer examplesHe kicks the car and says "Gar! Aargh!"By gar, we have a tempest!I told you he looked sick, by gar!You must come now, by gar!By gar, he is a coward.
